item.title: Notice about unavailable features / 停止中の機能について
item.description: [日本語は下部に] The following features are temporarily and indefinitely unavailable due to the spread of COVID-19. Viewing articles New requests to MEET & EAT Registration for new users New Q&A Others We can’t say for certain when these features become available again. We apologize for the sudden notice. Thank you for your understanding. 新型コロナウイルス感染症（COVID-19）の感染拡大に伴い、以下の機能を無期限で停止しております。 記事の表示 MEET & EAT新規申し込み ユーザの新規登録 Q&Aの作成 その他 現在のところ、再開の目処はたっておりません。 急なご連絡となり誠に申し訳ございません。 何卒よろしくお願いいたします。

item.title: [MEET & EAT] Suspending new requests / 新規申し込み一時中止のお知らせ
item.description: [日本語は下部に] MEET & EAT suspend accepting new requests due to the spread of coronavirus (COVID-19). We will announce when it reopens. MEET & EAT 新規申し込み一時中止のお知らせ 新型コロナウイルス感染症（COVID-19）の感染拡大に伴い、当面の間MEET & EATへの新規申し込みの受付を中止いたします。 再開の際は追ってご案内いたします。

item.title: We are updating Hub Japan's Privacy Policy and some features / プライバシーポリシーと一部機能の改定について
item.description: [日本語は下部に] We keep updating our services to deliver greater experience regarding your travel to Japan. To that end, we want you to understand choices and controls you have over your information on Hub Japan. To help explain, we are announcing some updates to Hub Japan's Privacy Policy. Key Changes: User-friendly language: We use more friendly terms so that it helps to understand what controls and choices about your privacy easier.

item.title: Notice about using MEET & EAT / MEET & EAT 注意事項
item.description: [日本語は下部に] MEET & EAT is intended for group matching. We recommend to bring friends, etc., as much as possible but if you cannot, please be extra careful. Also, we prohibit using the service for dating, business, and solicitation objectives in our terms. Please be careful to not cause troubles due to too many alcohols, etc. Please meet each other at one of the MEET & EAT Partner Restaurants to avoid troubles.

item.title: We launched “MEET & EAT” / “MEET & EAT”を正式公開しました
item.description: [日本語は下部に] On December 5, 2017, we launched “MEET & EAT”, an online matching service to find local Japanese to have a dinner together. We had been testing the service for few month, (thank you cooperators!) and refined the service to launch “MEET & EAT” [About MEET & EAT] “Socialize with local Japanese over food and drinks” MEET & EAT is a service for travelers (you and your company) and local Japanese (him/her and their company) to meet up, have a meal, and exchange cultures in a small maximum of 3 and 3 group.

item.title: We started Hub Japan Blog / Hub Japanブログを開設しました
item.description: [日本語は下部に] We started Hub Japan Blog to connect with our users. We will post updates and news about Hub Japan on this blog from now on. Hub Japanブログを開設しました。今後Hub Japanに関するお知らせなどをアップしていきます。よろしくお願いいたします。 Hub Japan English：https://hubjapan.io 日本語：https://ja.hubjapan.io
